DOC.brief_title: Alpha1 Antitrypsin Aerosol Therapy Cystic Fibrosis
DOC.detailed_description: Cystic fibrosis usually characterize chronic bacterial infection airway . Neutrophils release enzyme elastase airways enzyme prevent ingestion kill bacteria airway phagocytic cell . The hypothesis test inhibition elastase airways help neutrophil decrease number bacteria . Each subject cystic fibrosis first undergo aerosol therapy sterile saline solution sputum collect 2 , 4 6 hour aerosol therapy measure density bacteria . Subsequently , alpha1 antitrypsin , elastase inhibitor , give patient aerosol therapy twice 1 day sputum collect 2 , 4 6 hour treatment measure density bacteria . The result compare obtained aerosol therapy saline solution . Study phase II Study type Interventional Study design Purpose - treatment Allocation - nonrandomized trial Masking - open Control - active Assignment - cross-over Endpoint - efficacy Primary Outcome Measure Bacterial density sputum determine colony form unit 2 , 4 6 hour Prolastin therapy .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis cystic fibrosis Age 14 year old Women must negative pregnancy test use effective contraception Must able produce sputum Sputum culture positive Pseudomonas aeruginosa
